Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtraLife, Lamp, Player, Tile, Vehicle
    public abstract class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that contains the basic building blocks of everything in the game

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sprite

        public Sprite​(java.lang.String imageSrc,
              float x,
              float y)
        Constructor for a Sprite that does not have a tag
        Parameters:
        imageSrc - Image that will be rendered
        x - X position of the Sprite
        y - Y position of the Sprite

      • Sprite

        public Sprite​(java.lang.String imageSrc,
              float x,
              float y,
              java.lang.String[] tags)
        Constructor for a Sprite that has a tag(s)
        Parameters:
        imageSrc - Image that will be rendered
        x - X position of the Sprite
        y - Y position of the Sprite
        tags - Predefined tags that define how Sprites interact with each other

      • onScreen

        public final boolean onScreen​(float x,
                              float y)
        Checks if the Sprite is on the screen
        Parameters:
        x - Current x position of the Sprite
        y - Current y position of the Sprite
        Returns:
        true if Sprite is in the screen, and returns false if otherwise

      • collides

        public final boolean collides​(Sprite other)
        Uses BoundingBoxes to check if a Sprite collides with another
        Parameters:
        other - other Sprite to check
        Returns:
        true if the Sprites collide, false otherwise
